document_data.name: Rose Underwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Rose Underwood''' was [[Hogan Underwood]]'s niece. At the time of [[Khalitharius]]' release in {{yearlink|1356}}, she was visiting her uncle and bartending at his place.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|65}}
document_data.Personality: She was shy of strangers, but would talk once she warmed to the conversation.The comb is worth 10 sp, which is equivalent to a pound, rather than a fifth of a pound, in 1st edition.
document_data.Possessions: Rose kept an ornamental comb in her room, worth about a pound of silver.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|72}}
document_data.Rumors: She had been awakened in the middle of the night by strange noises coming from just north of the compound. She considered his uncle to be a honest man and a pillar of the community.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|67}}; once, while walking behind the smithy, she saw one of the sheik's sons enter the sandvoyagers' guild by a secret way; she could not tell the twins apart.
